text: Avɨz Jisasɨv sezɨr mbɨkɨr han oreŋgɨz aimŋgɨmar. Aimŋgɨz mbɨ ndɨŋ mbanave kamar. Nzɨ andɨŋ mɨŋun kin amar. Anchɨ hanɨhan mah apar mbɨkɨr mamɨrɨv ndɨh mamar mbanamb, mbɨ nsɨham nor ohɨra eŋgwi amar. Mbɨ wɨram akŋ anchɨ akŋ hamb nsɨham nor akŋ ai esa nsɨham norɨnd unchaŋ hɨrɨzɨŋgwɨmŋgɨmar han epari amar.
